info.title: MrRojo API
info.description: API for MrRojo Web application with hybrid authentication (Firebase + Local JWT)

post.description: Registers a new user. Tries Firebase first if internet is available, falls back to local registration.
Authenticates a user. Tries Firebase first if internet is available, falls back to local auth.

423.description: Account locked due to too many failed attempts

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's information

post.description: Logs out the current user (client should remove the token)
Updates the user's Firebase UID when coming back online
Generates new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token
Resets login attempts and unlocks a locked user account. Only managers can perform this action.

403.description: Forbidden - Only managers can unlock accounts

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile information

get.description: Retrieves all signalements with optional filtering.
Retrieves a signalement by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a signalement (marks it for deletion in sync).

post.description: Synchronizes all pending signalements with Firebase Firestore. (manager only)
Synchronizes users from PostgreSQL to Firestore. Only managers can perform this action.

403.description: Forbidden - Only managers can sync data

post.description: Creates a new user. Manager only.

get.description: Retrieves a user by their ID. Manager only.

put.description: Updates an existing user. Manager only.

post.description: Resets login attempts and unlocks a user account. Manager only.
Blocks a user account, preventing them from logging in. Manager only.
